Indiana Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012, the href="http://www.indystar.com/article/20110127/NEWS05/110127015/Mike Pence-says-he-will-bypass-White-House-run"> Indianapolis Star reported Thursday. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, the 51-year-old GOP congressman wrote in a letter to supporters. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Chairman and CEO Eric Schmidt said in a statement.
